docs: also , on two days , there were large stains on our white towels .the beach is very clean and was being attended to several times while we were there .the pool area was clean and we did not see any trash anywhere .the property was very clean . despite being nearly full , the resort did not feel crowded .the skirting boards were filthy in parts and there were stains on the carpet , not what i would expect for a hotel of this standing . </DOC> very clean beach .the rooms are clean and beautiful and most rooms have a beautiful view .the place is clean , well maintained , so attractive , and with a ton of amenities .it seems dirty and smelly .i tried wiping it and black came off of the tile . </DOC> the room was very clean upon arrival and check in was fast and easy .pools were also very clean and towels were always available .rooms are clean .all very clean , well maintained , and comfortable .the lobby looks brighter , but ultimately the same . </DOC> the north building is the only available buildiing for occupancy and although the rooms are clean and pleasant , the decoration reminds me of outdated caribbean motif with white bamboo furniture and flowery curtains .it was freshly painted and newly remodeled .but , it was strangely arranged and starkly decorated with mid - grade furniture .rooms were spacious and clean .clean rooms , plenty of amenities , decent food . </DOC> the hotel is clean and well maintained .for some reason , the resort advertises itself as being family oriented , but has mini trash cans in both the main room and the bathroom .pools are nicely kept .beach was pristine ... never saw litter or trash of any kind .it was pristine and the personnel at the spa were warm and friendly . </DOC> the staff is friendly , the rooms are spotless and the grounds are well manicured .my room ( 515 ) was very clean and even smelled clean .bathroom area small but again well fitted and very clean .the facilities really are pristine .no need to fear , everything was well maintained . </DOC> our room was clean and every room has a balcony .still not sure why they maintain the old iphone docking alarm clocks in a redone room .it was so frustrating day after day even bein careful to have stuff keep falling out .thus the need to use toilet paperour housekeeper in 908 was not on top of game . </DOC> our room was well presented and spacious , the only thing that let it down a little was the bathroom , which although very clean , was looking a little bit dated .we loved our room in the palms tower which was spotless and offered us a great view of the tiki pool and the beach .while we had a fabulous room , the wallpaper in the bathroom looked like someone had spilled a cup of coffee on it .do n’t ask for a room on the top floor as the engine above my head spoilt my staytowels in room are not fluffy of a cheaper quality .
summary: the room was clean and the beds comfortable .the room was clean and well appointed .</DOC><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad>
